snippet: Every few years, we revisit the question of what to do about the "problem" of Pennsylvania Station. But, the author asks, is there no one who would miss it if it were gone?
abstract: Every few years, we revisit the question of what to do about the "problem" of Pennsylvania Station. But, the author asks, is there no one who would miss it if it were gone?

headline.main: Celebrating a Transit Hub, in All Its Blandness
